reviews.review:
How to portal

Step 1: Shoot a wall
Step 2: Shoot another wall
Step 3: Walk through that wall
Step 4: Solve puzzles by going through walls
Repeat.

Great game, buy it.
Good Story, Good Gamplay, and Some Good Cake.
se voce gosta de ficar 30 min em um puzzle depois descobrir que era mais facil do que piscar o olho e se sentir um burro, esse jogo é pra você

Super gelungener Nachfolger von Portal! Auch wenn das Spiel relativ kurz ist, war es doch ein schönes Spiel und sein Geld auf jeden Fall wert. Valve - bitte einen Teil 3! (Was niemals passieren wird, da Valve nicht bis 3 zählen kann ;) )
This is literally my favorite game ever, I got a tattoo on my forearms in honor of this game. It's funny, challenging, story-rich, and great to play through multiple times.
its a great game to play with friends and the story is also pretty good.

This game is much like Alexandra Daddario, attractive, smooth, fun to be with. However unlike Alexandra, Portal 2 will cost alot less to buy. And let's be honest, you'd have to buy for her, and meet her, and she'll say no and you wonder what you've done wrong. You've made breakfast in bed and all she cares is how you got into her house. The police are called, you go to court and they tell you not to go near her again, then they deport you from the US, only to return home to your dad saying he's ashamed of you. Look just stick with Portal 2 and save yourself some trouble.
Remember to always think with Portals and don't trust GLADoS, 10/10 would port'
Вигали бого каниту ганна диорра вирол
Not as good as the first but still a great game
Super hra zabaví na hodně dlouho příběhová část i kooperace.
this game is perfection if perfection had the voice of stephen merchant
Одна из лучших игр для коопа

Verdiğiniz uygun ücretin karşılığını hem online hemde hikaye modu olarak veren bir oyun,herkese tavsiye ediyorum.Özellikle online olarak oynanması oyunu güzel kılan en büyük etken.Oyunun ping gibi bir sorunu yok serverları gayet başarılı çalışıyor.Bu fiyata böyle bir oyun almak sevindirici ve güzel.
para quem gosta de quebra-cabeça do tipo escape room, Muito bom.
Когда с первых минут начинаешь любить игру!
Best puzzle/coop game out there by far
play the first one  then this will be epic

Very good game, 10/10

(I haven't played the co-op yet)
2 kişi oynamak ve eğlenmek istiyorsanız tam size göre bir oyun
Non avete ancora giocato a Portal 2? Dove avete visuto fino ad ora?
One of the best cooperative gaming experiences I've ever had. Recommend if you and a friend are trying to find a game to play.
loved this game more than real life activities

This game is extremely good. It's probably one of, if not the, best games I've ever played. I love puzzle games, and all the mechanics are easy to understand, but the puzzles are challenging. The story is pretty small, but what there is of story is great. The comedic timing is top notch, and I found myself laughing out loud while playing through this game. Even when you complete the game, you can play online levels, so there's always something to do! I reccommend this game highly for anyone who's a fan of puzzles, platformers, or both!
It has portals, you pop portal to go to other places with that portal. Portals help you advance in the game. Portals are Friend

Portal 2 has a concise story paired with inventive first-person puzzle mechanics that challenged you to be creative while pulling the trigger. Portal 2 makes the original look like the prototype it was as it's filled with a larger cast of characters vividly brought to life through brilliant writing and some of the best voice acting in video games. Its puzzles are challenging without being unreasonable, and, once you're finished with the single-player mode, one of the best co-operative experiences on the market awaits. Valve cuts no corners and finds ways to make you care about everything from the major characters to the cubes used to solve puzzles. From the beginning of the single-player story to the end of the co-op mode, Portal 2 is a novel, unforgettable experience.
I love Portal 2. One of the best games ive ever played.
o melhor jogo que ja joguei.
Very good story, nice gamepaly and fun to play.
This game is pretty cool and you should get it for the puzzle and the story

Love watching the series, so I decided to buy the game!

Love solving the puzzles, while GLADoS, tries to end my demise!

Very fun and Unique!

Melhor continuação, melhores puzzles, melhores personagens, esse jogo é perfeito.
ps. 3 anos se passaram e continua sendo meu jogo preferido.
I never played a game with a better ending, than Portal 2. The rest of the game surely is also very awesome.
Chicken Mobile is the best Community Map designer!
One of the best puzzle games out there
超级 攒啊！我赚了g胖一个亿.jpg
realy funny game everyone should try
This game made me realize how stupid I am
Great game for both singleplayer and multiplayer. Recommend it a lot if you just like video games as a whole.
Jogo muito bom com puzzles dificeis e divertidos, vale muito a pena

Мне она очень понравилась, так же как и первая часть. Игра прекрасна во всём: геймплей, саундтрек, сюжет в конце концов. Игра явно оставила след в игроиндустрии. Но для полного понимания сюжета стоит пройти и первую часть. В игре есть два режима такие как: одиночный(основной сюжет)  и мультиплеер(отдельный сюжет)

포탈2는 포탈1에서 발전된 모습을 많이 보입니다. 
일단 스토리 비중이 커졌고, 다양한 퍼즐적 요소가 추가되어 포탈1을 즐기셨던 유저분들이라면 구매하셔도 후회없이 플레이하실 수 있을 겁니다.
다만 일부 맵들은 플레이어가 어떻게 풀어가야할지 감이 안잡히는 구간이 상당히 늘어나 이러한 부분은 뭔가 작은 힌트라도 있었으면 좋지않을까 하는 아쉬움이 남았습니다.
This game is awesome but some puzzles are hard.
